messages.content: Hello, may I see the menu?
Sure! Here is the menu. Feel free to order whenever you're ready.
Okay, let's add 2 {item_name}s.
Alright, 2 {item_name}s have been successfully added to your cart. Would you like to add anything else?
I just want to add {item_name} also, with extra {customization}.
Got it! {item_name} with extra {customization} has also been added. Anything else?
Okay then, add {item_name} too.
Sure. Items in your cart now are: 2 {item_name}s, 1 {item_name} with extra {customization}, and 1 {item_name}. The total will be calculated at checkout. Are you ready to proceed?
Yes, let's add all to the cart.
